name: Hold the bomb!
description:
Hold the bomb! is a party game where everyone passes the bomb to its neighbor before it explodes.

Instructions:

  • Select the number of players, then start your game.
  • Everyone holds the button as long as he likes and then passes the phone to the next player. The one who makes the bomb explode looses.

A game should last between 20 and 100 seconds.

Done for the trijam#67 (3 hour jam)
Made with Godot.

This is actually my first Godot Web export that is working. I’m planning to do more of this.

⚠ Beware on mobile: In order to hold the button, you have to slide a little your finger while holding in order to prevent the longpress event to be triggered. I don’t know how to get rid of this yet 🤷‍♀️
